name: Project: Amethyst
description:
The year is 2005. Your goal is to beat "Fakebook" in 10 years. Using a simple interface, you will customize your network, make cash, upgrade your page, and beat the best in the field. You will need to use intense strategy, thought, and more to make this happen. Check your analytics, play minigames to make cash, and eventually win the game of immense popularity. 

Now, as of this time, there is not that much "game" in the game. We are in less than 1 week of development, and we are constantly are working hard to make your experience better. Every day, our developers hopefully add more to your game, commit by commit.

Interact with the community. We have a Discord, or, for the better, we have a discussion board right here. Discuss the nightly's possible future ideas, or talk with the devs.
